definition: Malong county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
endless stream of horse and carriages (idiom)/heavy traffic
Malong county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan

sentences.english: Billy: Coach Malone, tell Robert good shoes make good players.
sentences.chinese: 可奇馬龍，告訴羅勃特好鞋造就好的運動員。

sentences.english: Malone could hear footfalls echoing from the flooring above.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍可以聽到上面的腳步聲迴盪下來。

sentences.english: Ma Long is taking intimate letter put up for the night ripely temple, by discovery of master sea empty rabbi.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍帶着密函投宿圓通寺，被師傅海空法師發現。

sentences.english: Malone and others to get information, make sure Lin Wu Yang and others seeking was high.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍等人獲得情報，確定林午陽等人在尋找曾高。

sentences.english: Malone knew that hundreds of books existed on Rennes.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍知道關於裏奈已經有了幾百本書。

sentences.english: Malone was familiar with the colorful editions.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍對這些充滿色彩的版本很熟悉。

sentences.english: Good point, Malone thought, but he still was not convinced.
sentences.chinese: 很到位的解釋，馬龍想，但他還是沒有被說服。

sentences.english: A swirl of first impressions raced through Malone’s mind.
sentences.chinese: 第一印象的漩渦衝過馬龍的思維。

sentences.english: It is located in the beautiful Liuxi River bank, next to the busy 105 federal highways.
sentences.chinese: 她位於美麗的流溪河畔，依傍車水馬龍的105國道。

sentences.english: Otherwise an approval shall be issued by Star Maling.
sentences.chinese: 否則必須得到星牌馬龍的正式認可。

sentences.english: Also Malone is a terrible person.
sentences.chinese: 還有馬龍這個人真是爛透了。

sentences.english: Malone told him what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍告訴他發生了什麼事。

sentences.english: Malone door and knocked, Molly found crouching in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍撞門而入，發現了蹲在牆角的莫莉。

sentences.english: Malone stepped close to a waist-high rock wall.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍走進齊腰高的石牆。

sentences.english: Malone realized that his friend was trying to take control of the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍意識到他的朋友試圖控制住談話的方向。

definition: to serve the ball/to tee off
(in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
Lungchi township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
